Wat weet jij over pistache (ijs)? De pistache noten uit ons ijs komen uit Bronte, dat ligt aan de voet van de Etna in Sicilië. Sicilië is de enige plek op aarde waar pistachenoten worden geteeld. De oogst is één keer in de twee jaar, zodat de boom haar kracht kan behouden. De minerale zouten in de vulkanische aarde zorgen voor een unieke zilte nasmaak. De smaak van ijs laat zich niet anders beschrijven dan echt pistache! #vansoest #utrechtsestraat #chocolade #chocolate #iamsterdam #amsterdamcityguide #lostinamsterdam #amsterdamworld #amsterdamcity #amsterdamtrip #amsterdamshots #amsterdamfood #amsterdamlife #atamsterdam #pistache #pistacheijs #icecream #icecreamamsterdam

The Duchess is located opposite of the W Hotel and housed in the old KAS Bank Building it is beautifully done! Service is a little American, with the 'Hi, my name is Peter and I am your host for tonight', but it is prompt, friendly and spot on!  The food not only tickles your tastebuds, several dishes have some form of spectacular table preparation. If you are a chocolate fan: try the chocolate explosion. And if you don't want to be wheeled out at the end of your dinner: share it! We think The Duchess is gonna be a beloved, young acting, golden oldie in Amsterdam. ——————————————————————— Food ⭐️⭐️️⭐️⭐️ Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Ambiance ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ ——————————————————————— #restaurant #lunch #dinner #theduchess #kasbank #whotels #spuistraat #amsterdam  #amsterdamrestaurants #amsterdamfood #food #proefwerk #foodstagram

The Duchess is located opposite of the W Hotel and housed in the old KAS Bank Building it is beautifully done! Service is a little American, with the 'Hi, my name is Peter and I am your host for tonight', but it is prompt, friendly and spot on!  The food not only tickles your tastebuds, several dishes have some form of spectacular table preparation. If you are a chocolate fan: try the chocolate explosion. And if you don't want to be wheeled out at the end of your dinner: share it! We think The Duchess is gonna be a beloved, young acting, golden oldie in Amsterdam. ——————————————————————— Food ⭐️⭐️️⭐️⭐️ Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Ambiance ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ ——————————————————————— #restaurant #lunch #dinner #theduchess #kasbank #whotels #spuistraat #amsterdam #bresaola #fennelseed  #amsterdam  #amsterdamrestaurants #amsterdamfood #food #proefwerk #foodstagram

YAY #day4 of my juice detox has been a huge success! 🎈 This morning when I woke up at 6 am I was loaded with energy and ready to rock the day. Throughout the morning and afternoon I wasn't feeling hungry at all and and I felt so focussed. Only during lunchtime, when everyone starts chewing their food, I had a bit of a grumpy moment but I'm too excited about this little journey to give up for some freshly baked bread............ (am I really?). However, I feel so creative and zen at the moment! My mind is loaded with ideas. I'm also motivated for things I would normally overthink, amazing right? I do realise my body needs a lot of rest to get the best cleansing results, so I'm gonna read my fave magazines and put on a face mask. AMSTERDAM • Cycled to Amsterdam Bos (Forest) on Sunday morning then had (more) delicious pancakes at the end of our ride. From the top: Apple with powdered sugar and cinnamon €6.80; ham pineapple and cheese with Mediterranean spices €9.40; pineapple with powdered sugar, roasted almonds and whipped cream €9.30; and hot cherries and chocolate with powdered sugar €9.80. The forest is beautiful - definitely worth a morning cycle there!

Mimi Latteria Milanese is located on the long long Kerkstraat near the corner with the Nieuwe Spiegelstraat. It is inspired on the small grocery stores that popped up in the post-war 50’s in Milan selling farmers products and serving home cooked dishes. This inspiration is to be found in the menu solely, because in the ambiance you would expect an ‘artisan’ touch but it is very contemporary. The restaurant is Italian owned and staffed, something we appreciate and gives a little confidence in taste. The menu provides a cross-section of Italian cuisine. Bruschette, some soups, pastas, and classic mains like vitello tonnato, coteletta alla Milanese, some salads and last but not least dolce like Tiramisù and dark chocolate pie. We chose for the Millefoglie, made of bread, vegetable and tomato caponata and mozzarella. Now technically what was on our plate was mozzarella, but after smoking it for about 15 minutes, the taste becomes much more dominant and then it is called scamorza. Not something we particularly appreciate and where other dishes were on the menu with scamorza specifically named, this dish hadn’t. So we asked for some mozzarella instead and were told that this was actually mozzarella, but then smoked. After a short discussion about clear communication and some waiting for the new dish, we got what we wanted. And it was more then tasty the way it was advertised. We also tried and liked some Italian sweets and coffee. ——— Food ⭐️⭐️️⭐️ Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️ Ambiance ⭐️⭐️⭐️ ——— MIMI Latteria Milanese Kerkstraat 148 020-7370239, reservations possible www.facebook.com/latteriamilanese/ Open: Mon-Sun 8.00-22.00 ——— #breakfast #coffee #lunch #dinner #kerkstraat #museumplein #amsterdamcentre #amsterdam #amsterdamrestaurants #amsterdamfood #food #proefwerk #instafood #foodstagram #restaurantreview #amsterdamreview ——— Follow AMSTERDAM RESTAURANTS for more reviews of your next to know favorites.  Tag the friend that you want to bring here.

Madam is the panorama bar and restaurant on the 20th floor of the newly developed @adam_toren. It is the square part, just beneath the observation desk (HELLO IM ADAM) and above the 19th floor revolving restaurant where they will serve 5- and 8-course dinners. Madam has a more brasserie style menu with classics like steak tartar, Caesar salad and rack of lamb.  Going up in a spectacular elevator and welcomed with a glass of Champagne, we were first overtaken by the VIEW! Words can't describe it properly, but maybe you can stay tuned on @amsterdamview and see for yourself.  Our sneak peak 4 course dinner started with smoked salmon followed by tom kha kai, supreme chicken and yes: there was still some room for a chocolate mousse. We loved it. Service and food are only in need of some fine tuning, but all is done from the heart.  We are curious what Moon is going to be like! But Madam had a terrific first try out evening! ——————————————————————— Food ⭐️⭐️️⭐️⭐️ Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Ambiance ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ ——————————————————————— #restaurant #club #cocktails #lookout #brasserie #Madam #MadamAmsterdam.nl #AdamToren #AdamToren.nl #IJoever #amsterdamnoord #amsterdam #wine #amsterdamrestaurants #amsterdamfood #food #proefwerk #foodstagram  #adamtoren #adamlookout #preopening #sneakpeak #tryoutdinner

There's a burger under that egg! Amsterdam had THE BEST food and I'm a picky eater (getting better). I was walking to another place and passed this restaurant on my way and came back another day. I was sick coming from Iceland and had a wicked sore throat my first couple of days in Amsterdam. I got this delicious and huge burger with equally delicious and fresh fries. Every thing was seasoned and so so good. They had a tea which soothed my throat almost instantaneously as well with lemon ginger and honey. I left stuffed and took home a slice of chocolate pie which was also amazing. The decor of this place was super cute and service was great. Recommend 10/10 Betty Blue for anyone passing through Amsterdam.  #bettyblue #food #foodporn #foodie #eaaats #eeeeeats #instafood #amsterdamfood #burgers #eggs #sunnysideegg #fries #amsterdamlife #travel #holland #netherlands #amsterdam #tea #nederlands
